name: Eggplant Caviar And Parsley-Mint Salad Topping
recipeCategory: condiments, pizza and calzones, salads and dressings
keywords: eggplant, garlic, italian parsley, lemon juice, mint leaves, scallion
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup Italian parsley, very coarsely chopped
1/4 cup fresh mint leaves, very coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: To make the eggplant, grill over white coals until tender, about 5 minutes per side. Peel off the skin, chop the flesh and place in a bowl. Stir in the garlic, lemon juice and salt.
To make the salad, combine the parsley, mint and scallions. Add the lemon juice, olive oil, salt and pepper and toss well.
When ready to assemble, spread the eggplant caviar over the pizzas, top with the salad and serve. Use on lemon-pepper crust.
